snippet: The state news media confirmed Monday that Xi Jinping, the new Communist Party chief, visited Guangdong Province over the weekend.
abstract: China's state news media confirms that Communist Party chief Xi Jinping visited Guangdong Province and economic zone Shenzhen, his first tour outside Beijing as party chief, signaling that Xi might favor more market-oriented economic policies.
lead_paragraph: The state news media confirmed Monday that Xi Jinping, the new Communist Party chief, visited Guangdong Province over the weekend.
